snippet.title: Cardseer Trailer (Demo)
snippet.description:
Cardseer is an upcoming deckbuilding card battler with a roguelike twist. Featuring a story based campaign, gauntlet mode, 4 playable classes and 200+ cards, check out the free demo on Itch.io and Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1773710/Cardseer/
https://aventia-entertainment.itch.io/cardseer
